title: Alpha client patcher very small
body:
http://imgur.com/a/Islvf

As shown in the above picture, the client is very small. Now, I'm not certain whether this is a to-be-fixed issue, but I figured I'd report it anyways.

The client is very small, so you can't even see the numbers properly. When the "Updating bar" filled up, it went outside the patcher, so you only see a portion of it.

I installed the client in a "PBE" folder on my desktop where PBE is installed.

Tried running as an administrator, but no difference.

Also pretty sure something is supposed to be displayed in the black area.

Would be awesome if you could expand the window like you normally would by placing the mouse on either side or in the corners.

replies.body: I just fixed this last week. You should see it work properly with the next patch.

Seems like you were supposed to see this:
http://imgur.com/a/BC3bu

It is looks to be an update bug that merged with the login screen or something.
Definitely something that Rito should look into.

GJ finding this bug! :D
I encountered this too. To solve it, go into display settings and change the size of text, apps and other items to a lower percent. Worked for me.
